text: @maga_girl_karen @turbo_squirrel @POTUS So if @RepAdamSchiff is blaming the "failed" impeachment for all of the COVID-19 deaths well news flash dumbass you were in charge of it. You were given one job to and you Fucked it up. To quote @realDonaldTrump "Your  Fired" I do hope you get voted out of office, what a joke.
